results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of parts in the k-th partition of n that does not contain 1 as a part, with partitions in lexicographic order.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..33, flattened
Tilman Piesk, Table for A194602, showing the non-one addends.

if n<2 then 0 else l:= NULL; b(n, 2, 0); l fi
mathematica: T[n_] := Module[{b, l}, b[n0_, i_, t_] :=
